Name: Purpose
Text: What was the purpose of the model?

Name: Purpose type
Text: What was the type of the study?

Name: BasicNote
Text: Notes of purpose

Name: HasImp
Text: Was there a clear implementation detail of the model?

Name: HasSim
Text: Was there at least one simulation experiment of the model?

Name: ABMTerm
Text: What did the term describe the ABM?

Name: ABMEntity
Text: What were the entities modelled in the ABM?

Name: ABMSto
Text: Was the ABM stochastic?

Name: ABMDataPop
Text: Was the ABM populated with empirical data?

Name: ABMDataPar
Text: Was the parameters of the ABM from empirical data?

Name: ABMDataFit
Text: Was the ABM calibrated by empirical observation?

Name: ABMNote
Text: Notes of the ABM

Name: EBMTerm
Text: What did the term describe the EBM?

Name: EBMEntity
Text: What were the entities modelled in the EBM?

Name: EBMSto
Text: Was the EBM stochastic?

Name: EBMDataPop
Text: Was the EBM populated with empirical data?

Name: EBMDataPar
Text: Was the parameters of the EBM from empirical data?

Name: EBMDataFit
Text: Was the EBM calibrated by empirical observation?

Name: EBMNote
Text: Notes of the EBM

Name: Overlap
Text: Did the ABM and the EBM include same entities?

Name: Relation
Text: What is the relation of the ABM and the EBM?

Name: Interactivity
Text: What is the frequency of interactions of the ABM and the EBM?

Name: Connection
Text: How did the two model connect to each other?

Name: Platform
Text: What was the modelling platform?

Name: Note
Text: Comments and notes
